item.title: Blocked road drain - causes road flooding, 11th April
item.description:
Blocked road drain - causes road flooding. The large drain is working but the smaller one further along Mill Lane is blocked causing water to spill over the road and into the very muddy road surface from the construction happening along the lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Woodgreen Mill Lane, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: KEEP CLEAR marking worn away, 11th April
item.description:
The KEEP CLEAR marking at the end of the road (under the streetlight) has worn away and is no longer visible. Attached (Google Streetview) photo shows what it should look like. Double yellow lines have also worn down the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Harefield Grove, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 4 street lights out, 11th April
item.description:
There are 4 street lights currently not working. 2 of them are intermittent. Currently been out for quite a while making it dangerous at night. All on Sotherby Drive. 1 by Aston Court 1 by Bentley Court 1 by 27 Sotherby Drive 1 by Renard Court
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 17 Sotherby Walk, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Badly patched pothole has returned, 11th April
item.description:
This section gets patched every year, and disintegrates quickly. Cars hit this at speed when wet, causing issues and spraying loose tarmac against cars in the neighbouring driveways.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 76 Whaddon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytip at Location, 10th April
item.description:
There is small flytip in the paassing place / layby located at the top of the hill from the entrance to Drypool Farm. The tip is paint pot(s) and plastic rubbish. Please can it be cleared up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cleeve Common, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Second Report of Flytipping at Location, 10th April
item.description:
This is the second time this flytip has been reported and is still there after a conversation that determined it WAS on part of the highway. The location is in the passing place Field gateway on the Cotswold Way Road between the top of Aggs Hill and the Burnt Oak Crossroads. The tip consist of a mixure of plastics and garden waste. Please can it be cleared up
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
